description:
The OneScript is an independent cross-platform open-source implementation of virtual machine for BSL (1C:Enterprise Business-Script Language).

Script execution doesn't use any of 1C:Enterprise system libraries and doesn't require installation of 1C:Enterprise system on target machine.

This package runs the official OneScript installer, resulting in `oscript` and `opm` being installed under Program Files and added to the SYSTEM PATH environment variable.
author: OneScript Team
